entry.title: Russia Seeks to Deplete Ukraine's Air Defenses Ahead of Kyiv's Expected Offensive
entry.content: Ukraine said it had shot down a slew of drones overnight as the country’s Western backers prepared to meet to discuss fresh military supplies.

entry.title: A Record Number of Journalists Were Detained Worldwide Prior to Evan Gershkovich's Arrest
entry.content: “It’s gotten worse everywhere,” the Committee to Protect Journalists said about press freedom.

entry.title: Ukraine Pilots Stretch Soviet-Era Helicopters to Their Limits in Daring Assaults
entry.content: More than a year into the war, helicopter units are playing an increasingly vital role in Ukraine’s efforts to hold the Russians back in the east.
